short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Vendor information to the ARP Table (Only Toast Devices at the moment) arp table goes brrrr....

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances your browsing experience by introducing a new feature to the ARP Table. It seamlessly integrates a new column that displays the manufacturer associated with each MAC address in the table. 

Presently, this feature is optimized to exclusively reveal manufacturers related to Toast Devices. 

In the future, our extension aims to expand its capabilities, encompassing a comprehensive list of manufacturers for all MAC addresses. Elevate your interaction with the ARP Table using this tool and stay tuned for broader functionality updates.

basically arp table goes brrrrr......
